Title: MyUni Sample App
Description: This education-focused DocuSign sample application demonstrates some common DocuSign API integration workflows built from the DocuSign eSignature API, DocuSign Click API, DocuSign Payments, and DocuSign Connect.
SandboxText: Get Started with the DocuSign APIs Today
Description2: With the DocuSign developer account, you can test our APIs for free! Developer accounts do not expire and have enterprise-level features enabled.
Features:
MyUni features:

  • Send document for signature
  • Update recipient information
  • Embedded signing
  • Create an envelope from HTML import
  • Real-time status reporting
  • Fill tab data
  • Create a clickwrap
  • Embed a clickwrap on your site
  • Calculated (formula) fields
AboutDocuSign:
About DocuSign

  • More than 1,000,000 paying customers and over a billion users in over 180 countries
  • More than 300,000 new unique users join the DocuSign Global Trust Network every day
  • 83% of DocuSign documents are returned within 1 hour, with 50% completed within 15 minutes
  • $36 per document savings when you leave paper behind
  • DocuSign is available in 44 languages
